alert.note: Alert for Irion; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 9:07PM CDT until June 09 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Tom Green County in west central Texas... Northeastern Irion County in west central Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 906 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tankersley, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Twin Buttes Reservoir around 910 PM CDT. Lake Nasworthy, O.c. Fisher Reservoir, San Angelo State Park and Grape Creek around 915 PM CDT. San Angelo around 920 PM CDT. Goodfellow Air Force Base around 925 PM CDT. Wall around 930 PM CDT. Veribest around 935 PM CDT. Vancourt around 940 PM CDT. Mereta around 945 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Harriet and Us-67 Near The Irion-Tom Green County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
